import React from "react"; import Navbar from "../adminnavbar/Navbar"; import axios from "axios"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import swal from 'sweetalert'; import Navigation from "../verticalNavigation/Navigation"; function Userlist() { const [userdetails, setUserdetails] = useState([]); const [Active,setActive]=useState() useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/newadmin/userlists/").then((Response) => { setUserdetails(Response.data); }); }, [Active]); const userdelete=(id)=>{ alert ("are you want to unblock") axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/newadmin/useredit/${id}`).then((Response)=>{ setActive(Response.data) console.log(Active) console.log("this is then") }).catch((error)=>{ console.log("this is flase ") }) } return (
